description:
An oil-funded think tank backed by Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orbán is involved in organising widespread farmer protests in the run-up to the EU elections, DeSmog can reveal. Hardline farming groups pledged to “sweep away” EU decision-makers at a “lunch and discussion” event, which was hosted by MCC Brussels on April 9. The think tank […]

The post Orbán-backed Think Tank Courts Farmers Linked to Far Right Ahead of EU Poll appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Orbán-backed Think Tank Courts Farmers Linked to Far Right Ahead of EU Poll

description:
A large blue billboard stands outside a park in the town of Conegliano in northern Italian. On the left, a man pops a vast cricket into his mouth. On the right, are the words, “Let’s Change Europe before it changes us” – and the dates of the upcoming elections.   The poster – an advert for […]

The post DeSmog Launches Investigation Into Food and Farming Misinformation Ahead of EU Elections appeared first on DeSmog.
title: DeSmog Launches Investigation Into Food and Farming Misinformation Ahead of EU Elections

description:
A Q&A with DeSmog reporter Justin Noble about his revelatory new book, Petroleum-238, that takes on the fracking industry for exposing workers to radioactive contamination.

The post How Fracking Is Making Some U.S. Communities More Radioactive Than Chernobyl appeared first on DeSmog.
title: How Fracking Is Making Some U.S. Communities More Radioactive Than Chernobyl
